params.marginOfVotesForMajority: the proposal needs to have 50% plus this number
params.minimumQuorumForProposals: how many members must vote on a proposal for it to be executed
params.minutesForDebate: the minimum amount of delay between when a proposal is made and when it can be executed

params.beneficiary: who to send the ether to

params.supportsProposal: either in favor or against it
